issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.summary: Application freeze when running on IOS device. Only with SDK 3.5.1

comments.body:
Hi,

Please provide the test case to reproduce your problem, Here is the guide about [how to create a test case|http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/How_to_Submit_a_Bug_Report-section-29004732_HowtoSubmitaBugReport-CreatingaTestCase].
And on the other hand, try to clean the project and run it again.
